description: Episode number 10 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Examines the cognitive changes occuring in children between 5 & 7 years. Reviews research on conceptual and memory development, logical reasoning and problem solving. Observes a Japanese child assuming family responsibilities, Russian children joining the Young Pioneers and Brazilian children participating in church rituals.
